page.title: 02Keeping the Peace in Yeovil.
page.content: The present{Police Headquarters} was built in 1976.{118 officers} operate from there including 11 police women,14 plain clothes officers,17 traffic wardens,30 community officers and 1 dog handler.The station receives about 100 calls per day,12-13 of which are emergency calls. {Crime rate}is rising by{6-7%, slightly below the national average, where as the{detection rate}is about{ {57%}(national average 27%).Most crime takes the form of{theft}from vehicles & shoplifting, & is committed by people under 35 years.Juvenile crime follows the same pattern with shoplifting the main offence. {Drug}abuse,football hooliganism & {crimes of violence}are not problems. The last murder occurred 9 years ago.
